briefdescription.para: Macro for creating an instance of the SPI master driver.
This value can be provided instead of a pin number for signals MOSI, MISO, and Slave Select to specify that the given signal is not used and therefore does not need to be connected to a pin.
SPI master instance default configuration. This configuration sets up SPI with the following options:

listitem.para: mode 0 enabled (SCK active high, sample on leading edge of clock)

parameterdescription.para: SCK pin.
MOSI pin.
MISO pin.
SS pin.

briefdescription.para: Macro for setting up single transfer descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: This macro is for internal use only.

briefdescription.para: Macro for setting the duplex TX RX transfer.
Macro for setting the TX transfer.
Macro for setting the RX transfer.
SPI master driver event types, passed to the handler routine provided during initialization.
SPI master driver event handler type.

memberdef.argsstring: (nrfx_spi_t const *p_instance, nrfx_spi_config_t const *p_config, nrfx_spi_evt_handler_t handler, void *p_context)
memberdef.name: nrfx_spi_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the SPI master driver instance.

detaileddescription.para: This function configures and enables the specified peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Pointer to the structure with the initial configuration.
Event handler provided by the user. If NULL, transfers will be performed in blocking mode.
Context passed to the event handler.
Initialization was successful.
The driver is already initialized.
The driver is already initialized. Deprecated - use NRFX_ERROR_ALREADY instead.
Some other peripheral with the same instance ID is already in use. This is possible only if Peripheral Resource Sharing (PRS) module is enabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for reconfiguring the SPI master driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Pointer to the structure with the configuration.
Reconfiguration was successful.
The driver is during transfer.
The driver is uninitialized.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the SPI master driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the SPI driver instance is initialized.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Instance is already initialized.
Instance is not initialized.

briefdescription.para: Function for starting the SPI data transfer.

detaileddescription.para: If an event handler was provided in the nrfx_spi_init call, this function returns immediately and the handler is called when the transfer is done. Otherwise, the transfer is performed in blocking mode, which means that this function returns when the transfer is finished.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
Pointer to the transfer descriptor.
Transfer options (0 for default settings). Currently, no additional flags are available.
The procedure is successful.
The driver is not ready for a new transfer.
The provided parameters are not supported.

briefdescription.para: Function for aborting the ongoing transfer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the driver instance structure.
